name: EMT Drift
description:
EMT Drift is an arcade-style drifter. find patients and save them before time runs out while getting as many points as possible along the way.

This project is currently unfinished, and many features have not been added as I was not able to do so within the game jam time, however, I plan on completing the game in the near future.

How To Play:

-Use W,A,S,D to drive the ambulance

-SHIFT gives you a boost in speed

-Press BACKSPACE to spawn an AI car (this feature is still in development)

-Get points by saving patients and drifting your way around the city.
